ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReappointment of HARRY JAMES KOWAL of Kingston, Ontario, as a special adviser to the Minister of National Defence, to serve as Principal of the Royal Military College of Canada, to hold office during pleasure for a term of five years, effective August 1, 2019.
